DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate if patients who had a serious cardiovascular event upon initiation of fingolimod are at risk to delevop long term other cardiovascular events
DOC.brief_title: Long-term, Open-label, Multicenter Study Assessing Long-term Cardiovascular Risks in Patients Treated With Fingolimod
DOC.criteria: Patients participating in study FTY720D2406 who experienced a serious cardiovascular event during their fingolimod treatment initiation Patients still on fingolimod after the this first dose serious event
